sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of numerous types of zhi chuang 痔瘡 , piles sores. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 34: 有一 方而治之者，名為諸痔，非為諸病共成一痔 , “As there is one identical recipe to cure them, one speaks of ‘ all types of piles ’. It is not so that all types of diseases bring forth one identical type of piles”. Zhu zhong 諸腫 , all types of swelling [11]

Pathological Condition underlying all types of zhong 腫 , swelling. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 31: 其候非一，故謂 之諸腫 , “It has more than one sign. Hence one speaks of ‘ all types of swelling ’”. In the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 , zhu zhong 諸腫 includes edematose swelling and swelling associated with sores/ulcers. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：諸腫，有 風腫、熱腫、水腫、濕腫、氣腫、虛腫、積腫、血腫 , “ All types of swell ing includes wind swelling; heat swelling; water/edematose swelling; moisture swelling; qi swelling; depletion swelling; accumulation swelling; blood swelling”.
